OrgName: T3C Inc. dba Retail Solutions Inc.
activities: Retail Solutions Inc. (RSi) receives the following data elements from customer business organizations for their employees to be able to have unique login accounts to access RSi’s SaaS platforms (Service Portal):  Email, First Name, Last Name and Location; Phone # is optional.  Aside from the primary purpose of login accounts, other purposes may include:  Using email and the other personal information submitted through the RSi website to reply to customer inquiries, to provide customers with more information on RSi’s products, services or other general information, and to inform customers about new services. Customers may opt-out of receiving future correspondence at any time as set forth in the Choice / Opt Out section of RSi’s Privacy Policy.  RSi does not disclose personal information to any third party without obtaining permission from the customer.  RSi does not sell personal information to third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer employee first and last name, email addresses, telephone numbers, location; on-line data, off-line data, business cards
